data.md:MetaData: river, Physiography: river valley in coastal lowland, Vegetation: open Larix dahurica forest, Formation: boreal forest, Location: Adychan river terrace exposure, site located in the Yana-Indigirka-Kolyma lowland
Late Quaternary vegetation and climate of Siberia and the Russian far east (Palynological and Radiocarbon Database)
